You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesT T] > &trade;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&TRADE;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2122/index.htm U+02122].
  * `&trade;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2122/index.htm U+02122].
